image=”8344″ img_size=”1000*600″ style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Corporate Event” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

Any business that wants to strengthen its network needs to know how to produce professional events. Whether it’s an employee training event, product launch, or annual general meeting of corporates, the basic elements of corporate event management need to be followed which can be broadly categorized as research, planning, coordination, and evaluation. Corporate event management provides businesses a personal way to build a personal relationship with their target audiences and build brand recognition and loyalty. We at Archi Event helps corporates to bridge this gap and produce exceptional events. At the same time, we maintain the dignity and decency of the corporate culture. Our team is specially trained to design corporate event in a way that it feels legendary and simple at the same time.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602960868028{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/inline_image_preview.jpg?id=8317) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Archi Events?” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_column_text]

Archi Events stands from the competitors as we not just simply assure you to deliver the best but constantly improves ourselves. For us corporate occasions are not merely a social gathering, it conveys the picture of the organization or business you are associated with. We handle for you a variety of corporate events services which will guarantee an extraordinary experience for your customers. We create your occasions broadloom and significant with sublime stylistic design and enable you to pick the best place, menu, and thing which will influence you and your business to sparkle.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8343″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602961147920{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/119627-white-and-gold-abstract-background-image.jpg?id=7867) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_single_image image=”7942″ img_size=”1200*825″ style=”vc_box_border” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Services we Provide” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text]

We offer a range of creative thoughts and special occasions solutions to suit every demand and spending program. We work intimately with every one of our customers to make an occasion that communicates results and enables the personal touch to every occasion we compose. We have plenty of propositions and experiences. We are experts in designing and implementing extremely corporate occasions in Jaipur, drawing our numerous years of expertise.

  • Seminars
  • Conferences
  • Dealers Meet
  • Award Ceremony
  • Product Launching
  • Corporate Training’s
  • Product Branding & Promotion’s
  • Staff Welfare Activities & Function’s
  • And Many More Services …………..

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
